mapper.select: select distinct t1.id as id , t1.device_id as device_id , t1.device_name as device_name, t1.device_type as device_type, t1.state as state, t3.flv as flv, t3.hls as hls from tb_video_device t1 left join tb_building_archives t2 on t1.building_id = t2.id left join tb_video_play t3 on t1.device_id = t3.device_id
select count(distinct t1.id) from tb_video_device t1 left join tb_building_archives t2 on t1.building_id = t2.id left join tb_video_play t3 on t1.device_id = t3.device_id
